title: Rude bully kids are ruining this game
body:
The problem starts at the players selection window, I almost always find these bullies pretending to tell you what you "must" do.
In the best scenario they will just close the window and leave but sometimes they are there and building the hate until when the game starts.
I understand that something unpleasant will happen during the game and in fact these bullies start insulting and harassing and if you react they will pretend to report you!
This is a fun game and I see that most of players don't understand the meaning of team play, though they only play for themselves and build their profile up.
I'm going to look for alternative games because I "hate" dealing with rude and uneducated people.

champ select is stressful for a reason, generally when I play I get everyones lolking, if I see they have 80+ games on x mid laners I really want to get them in that role, so I kind of control champ select in a way that directs people into x role and x champions. 

When an ADC main who has played 6 games of ap mid as a bunch of random ap's like Veig, Ahri, Orianna, Cassiopedia, Syndra, Swain all with crappy kds I will start a huge fight.
